Posted By: Drewsel (5/28/2012 8:22:20 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Just figured out why it's in the set. It's a Portal card. Pretty rare. It's not P3K, but it's still Portal. Also it was one of the Designer's favorite Dragons ever even after they got bored of most of the Dragons in DnD and WoW and MTG.
  
   
This was the 15th Anniversary Set Special Commemorative Box....I think the Vault should stop being Annual and start waiting for other Special Occasions like that. Returning to Ravnica happens to be Special, but I don't know of anything in between FTV: D and Return to Ravnica that really counts as 'This Historic Moment really needs a Monument'
  
   
Anyway, they picked the dragons because they needed one for each year.
  
   
I hope Wizards considers changing and IMPROVING the From the Vault series, or I fear it will end up discontinued like the Premium Deck Series. :P
posts.html:
Just figured out why it's in the set. It's a Portal card. Pretty rare. It's not P3K, but it's still Portal. Also it was one of the Designer's favorite Dragons ever even after they got bored of most of the Dragons in DnD and WoW and MTG.

This was the 15th Anniversary Set Special Commemorative Box....I think the Vault should stop being Annual and start waiting for other Special Occasions like that. Returning to Ravnica happens to be Special, but I don't know of anything in between FTV: D and Return to Ravnica that really counts as 'This Historic Moment really needs a Monument'

Anyway, they picked the dragons because they needed one for each year.

I hope Wizards considers changing and IMPROVING the From the Vault series, or I fear it will end up discontinued like the Premium Deck Series. :P
